articles.title: Polaris Dawn astronauts perform historic private spacewalk while wearing SpaceX-made suits - TechCrunch
articles.description: A crew of four private astronauts made history in the early hours of Thursday when they opened the hatch of their SpaceX Dragon capsule and conducted the
articles.content:
A crew of four private astronauts made history in the early hours of Thursday when they opened the hatch of their SpaceX Dragon capsule and conducted the first commercial spacewalk.
